Description:
Build Your Dream !!!
Titled Block and ready to build !! your dream home with approx 400 sqm of land to play with. With a approx 12.5 -metre frontage, this block is suitable for an array of home designs and provides the perfect opportunity for you to build your family home in this Highly sought-after Cloverton Estate.
Cloverton estate will become a centre of education for northern Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all being developed. A major retail centre is being planned while public transport and medical services provide everything the community needs.
For any developer/investor/or first home buyer, this is an incredible opportunity to invest your money wisely.

Description:
A Great opportunity to secure Future in Kalkallo
Take advantage of this very rare opportunity to secure this huge parcel of vacant land approximately 2,457sqm with 30m frontage located in one of North's most sought after up and coming locations.
Kalkallo - is approximately 35km from Melbourne's CBD - and is in the North's vibrant heartland and part of Victoria's biggest master planned community.
Kalkallo is an exciting new community in Melbourne's north that will offer your family a world of choice, enjoy access to the best of what Craigieburn and Epping has to offer, Close to the Hume freeway and donnybrook train station, your own private space of 2,457m2 (approx.) with the option to re-develop (Subject To Council Approval).
This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!
Forthcoming Auction, unless sold prior.

Description:
Brand New Luxury Family Home By Dennis Family Homes
Land Size : 541m2
Home Size : 31 sq's approx
Built By : Dennis Family Homes
If you appreciate purity of design and great home aesthetics then,this home is designed with you in mind.The use of clean lines inside and out, gives this home an uncluttered frontage and utterly roomy informal living space of approx 31sqs. In this home the focus is on the open floor plan that prominently feature expansive windows, making them perfect for using natural light to illuminate the interior of the home.
Designed to accommodate both a growing family and first home buyers.The Master comprising of a WIR'S and an en suite, remaining three large Bedrooms with WIR', Games / Theater room, spacious open plan living area and a great kitchen featuring 900mm appliances, stone bench top & envious walk in pantry.
Luxury Inclusions Offered:
* European designed stainless steel appliances
* Evaporative Cooling
* Ducted Heating
* Down lights
* Alfresco Entertaining Area
* Double Garage with secure internal access
* Driveway & much more
Cloverton Estate is perfect for nature lovers after a relaxed lifestyle. Proposed sporting facilities, cycling paths, parks and playgrounds will keep you feeling healthy and active.
Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station and the future Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy. Cloverton has proposed community centres, state and private primary and secondary schools, childcare options as well as a proposed tertiary institution. You will feel proud to be a part of this Boutique Community and own a patch of this great Estate.
To avoid missing out on this lovely Family home, please call and inspect the home.
Please note: The front and Back landscaping not included. Landscaped green grass displayed on photo images is for illustrative purposes only.

Description:
TITLED LAND READY TO BUILD IN CLOVERTON!!
Take advantage of this very rare opportunity to secure this block of vacant land located in one of the North's most sought after up and coming locations CLOVERTON. This block is titled and ready to build. Cloverton will become home to plenty of fantastic amenities, including schools, shopping, childcare, community centres and beautiful parks with amazing playgrounds. This block of land offers everything you need. Cloverton has proposed community centres, state primary and secondary schools, as well as tertiary institutions. Cloverton is soon to be home to a proposed major retail and Metropolitan Activity Centre - catering for everything a growing community needs. Minutes from the existing Donnybrook Train Station and the future Train Station, access to the Melbourne CBD will be quick and easy. Backing onto the flowing Merri Creek and with 80 hectares of conservation area, Cloverton is perfect for nature lovers after a relaxed lifestyle. Stockland is Australia's leading developer of Green Star communities as recognised by the Green Building Council of Australia. Choosing a Green Star community can help you save money, create a healthy environment and minimise your environmental footprint, while building a better future for everyone. Also with all the Craigieburn facilities only minutes away including shops, schools, parkland and transport this parcel of land could make for the perfect new home site. This really is a great opportunity not to be missed!! Buy now before it's too late!!

Description:
Approximately 512m2 Allotment In Kalkallo Estate
Look to the future! Presenting a landmark residential opportunity with this individual allotment of approximately 512m2 situated in the Cloverton Estates, Kallo Precinct. Located close to Donnybrook train station, Hume freeway access, and Highlands shopping centre, this generous block will enable a leisurely commute to Melbourne's CBD. Buy and build or simply invest and rest in this high demand growth area catering to the needs of the next generation of homeowners in Melbourne's north. Readily accommodating a generously-proportioned family home, the allotment is well positioned to take advantage of nearby Merri Creek conservation area greenery and nature trails. Diligently master-planned, the community includes proposed sporting facilities, cycling paths and parks. It also promises the future implementation of a host of amenities including schools, shopping centres, childcare facilities, community centres and playgrounds. Traditional, contemporary, conservative or wild? Whatever your taste, this dream site will enable you to create the home you always wanted and secure your family's future.

Description:
Your Future is here!
Brand New Home under construction.
Consisting of 4 bedrooms, master with W.I.R. and full en suite.Remaining 3 bedrooms have B.I.R's
Porcelain tiles 600x600 in Living areas and Floating Floors in Bedrooms.
W.I.P to the kitchen, 900mm oven and rangehood, 40mm stone benchtops to kitchen, with waterfall.
Alfresco living, for added living all year round. Additional retreat area, for extra comfort.
Added Luxury includes, Fully tiled Ensuite and Central Bathroom.
Central Heating and evaporative cooling throughout the home.
Estimated completion time is June
For more information and plans, please call Lana on 0428 475 889
